channel.title: +०५ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +०५ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: UNKNOWN_TITLE
item.description: 01 Now, then, as to the taking of milk as fast-food: the initiated should take milk for his fast-food. Once upon a time the nectar of immortality departed from the gods. 02 They said, ‘Let us seek for it here by toil and penance!’ They sought for it by toil and penance. Having become initiated, they were living on fast-milk, for penance it is when, after becoming initiated, one lives on fast-milk.

item.title: UNKNOWN_TITLE
item.description: 01 Indra saw this seven-versed (hymn, suitable) for making good what is deficient 1, for reducing what is redundant, and for perfecting what is imperfect. And, indeed, after building the fire-altar, one is (still) apt to get into trouble, or to stumble, or what not. Now, when Śyāparṇa Sāyakāyana heard this, he ventured upon this performance. 02 Now, there is here a perfecting of three things,–the perfecting of the fire-altar, the perfecting of him who has it built for him, and the perfecting of him who builds it.
